description: Detects different process creation events as described in various threat reports on Lazarus group activity Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Overlap with legitimate process activity in some cases (especially selection 3 and 4)
name: Lazarus Activity
query: (process.command_line:(*reg.exe\ save\ hklm\\sam\ %temp%\\\~reg_sam.save* OR *1q2w3e4r@#$@#$@#$* OR *\ \-hp1q2w3e4\ * OR *.dat\ data03\ 10000\ \-p\ *) OR (process.command_line:*process\ call\ create* AND process.command_line:*\ >\ %temp%\\\~*) OR (process.command_line:*netstat\ \-aon\ |\ find\ * AND process.command_line:*\ >\ %temp%\\\~*) OR process.command_line:*.255\ 10\ C\:\\ProgramData\\*)
